name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking with heart rate monitoring, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant and compatible with all major fitness apps.

name: Ultra HD 4K Camera
description: Professional 4K camera with 20MP sensor, 4K video recording, 5-axis stabilization, and interchangeable lenses. Perfect for photography enthusiasts and content creators.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance gaming laptop with RTX 4070, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and 15.6-inch 144Hz display. Built for serious gamers and content creators.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Precision gaming mouse with 25K DPI sensor, programmable buttons, RGB lighting, and ultra-lightweight design. Perfect for competitive gaming.
